entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: E 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 70 later this morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
